                 int d,
                 int t,
                 java.lang.String f,
                 java.lang.String type,
                 int id)
        Adds a patron to the list and returns the ticket price
        Parameters:
        movieN - movie to be watched
        rating - movie rating
        d - date
        t - time
        f - feature
        type - type of patron
        id - id of the patron
        Returns:
        the price of the ticket. Returns -1 if type is invalid
